short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Defeat the AI Opponent in a game of Checkers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The perfect way to turn your boring new tab page into an exciting battleground for the classic game of checkers. Say goodbye to mindlessly scrolling through a blank tab and hello to endless hours of strategic fun!

With Checkers Tab Game, you're just one click away from a challenging game of checkers. No need to install additional software or waste time searching for online games Play Versus AI and challenge yourself with a game against the computer AI.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the Checkers Tab Game extension and set the new tab search to that provided by the service. The search will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

Revive the joy of checkers on your new tab page with the Checkers Tab Game Chrome Extension. Whether you're a casual player or a seasoned strategist, this extension promises hours of entertainment and mental stimulation every time you open a new tab in your Chrome browser.
